message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. I think it's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you thinking of me, but $9500 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8000.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9000. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price.  While $9000 is getting closer, I'm still hoping for a bit more.  I'm willing to offer $8500.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure you'll still make a profit.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8750. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll really love the product.
